text: François Baron Englert (; born 6 November 1932) is a Belgian theoretical physicist. In 2013, he won the Nobel Prize in Physics with Peter Higgs for their work in the discovery of the Brout-Englert-Higgs mechanism. ==References== ==Other websites== * François Englert's personal webpage Category:Wolf Prize winners Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:Holocaust survivors Category:Belgian physicists Category:People from Brussels Category:Academics of Tel Aviv University
title: François Englert
